hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{8} \text{ to the right}\\
+& \underline{\blue{?} \text{ to the left}}\\
=&\pink{13} \text{ total spins}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{13} \text{ total spins}\\
-& \underline{\green{8} \text{ to the right}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ to the left}\end{align}$

question.content:
The ballerina did $13$ spins. She spun to the right $8$ times and the rest of the spins were to the left. 

**How many spins did she do to the left?** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] spins
